name: A Halloween Swipe
description:
A very addictive swipe elimination game, don't miss it! You swipe groups of 3 or more same pumpkins. Swipe as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Gear up for this entertaining and casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Tip:
Long chain will give you bonus score.

Features:
Fun of swiping.
Very cute and clean graphics.
High quality sound effects.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.
Retina display optimised.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.

Enjoy!
